content: Omigawd, Shaunta, if I read all these books, when the hell would I ever have any time for writing? Look, could I just buy them and put them on my shelf, and never have to read them.Actually, what I need is help getting my stuff published once it’s written. So Write. Publish. Repeat. might be useful for me. And I see I’ve already read Steering the Craft and Steal Like An Artist.
